inclusion.criterion: Increased fasting blood glucose from 6.1 to 7.0 mmol / L or
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Decreased glucose tolerance of 7 , 8 to 11.1 mmol / L or
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Glycated hemoglobin with values between 5.7 and 6.4%
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Use dietary supplements (vitamins, minerals, bioflavonoids, prebiotics, probiotics or other bioactive compounds)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Exercise intensely (more than 10 hours per week)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: History of cardiovascular diseases , diabetes mellitus, liver and kidney disease.
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: The patient has a history of cardiomyopathy but it will be treated with ACE inhibitors and Beta blockers.
